content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of a furnace located at (5.0, 5.0) used to smelt iron ore (with coal) into iron plates.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a furnace located at (-27.0, -60.0) used to smelt copper ore (with coal) into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Usage Errors
  - Use the correct argument structure when invoking get_entities. Avoid unsupported keyword arguments (such as 'radius') and ensure that parameter order and types match the API specification.

• Lab Crafting and Placement Failures
  - Verify that a lab exists in the inventory before attempting to place it on the map.
  - Ensure that all required recipe sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) are available in sufficient quantities to allow lab crafting.
  - Guard against iterating over a None value when retrieving entities by handling empty or null responses appropriately.

• Resource and Process Verification
  - Confirm that requisite resources are processed (via smelting or other production methods) to meet crafting requirements before triggering lab production actions.
